content.text:
# 15th TCA Awards

The 15th TCA Awards were presented by the Television Critics Association in a ceremony hosted by Craig Kilborn that was held on July 23, 1999, at the Ritz-Carlton Huntington Hotel and Spa in Pasadena, Calif.
Winners and nominees

|-
!width="350"|Category
!width="350"|Winner
!width="380"|Other Nominees
|-

|

* ''The Farmer's Wife (PBS)
* NYPD Blue (ABC)
* The Practice (ABC)
* Sports Night (ABC)
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Comedy
|align="center" | Sports Night (ABC)
|
* Ally McBeal (Fox)
* Everybody Loves Raymond (CBS)
* Friends (NBC)
* Will & Grace (NBC)
|-

|align="center" | The Sopranos (HBO)
